text: @Andrew_Adonis No! What is sad is the disregard for teacher’s safety - Office for national statistics shows at least 65 education staff have died with coronavirus, of which 43 were women and 22 were men, as of April 20. 4 weeks ago I wonder how many have died in lockdown?
